snippet: A steep drop in Australian newspapers took a toll on the company, in its first quarter since it was split from the more prosperous side of Rupert Murdoch’s empire.
abstract: News Corp reports steeper-than-expected 3 percent decline in revenue in its first quarter since it split from Fox, its more profitable sibling entertainment business; steep decline in Australian newspapers takes toll.
lead_paragraph: A steep drop in Australian newspapers took a toll on the company, in its first quarter since it was split from the more prosperous side of Rupert Murdoch’s empire.

headline.main: News Corp. Revenue Falls Well Short of Forecasts
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Revenue Falls Well Short Of Forecasts
